articles.description: Kuo is an analyst for TF International Securities who focuses on the Asian electronics supply chain and often discusses Apple products before they're launched.
articles.content:
Apple has plans to make a folding iPhone starting next year, reliable analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said on Wednesday.
Kuo said Apple's folding phone could have a display made by Samsung Display, which is pl… [+1574 chars]

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.title: All Glowing Musical Note locations in Disney Dreamlight Valley - Destructoid
articles.description: Pirate music sure is fun to listen to.
articles.content: When you think of pirate caves in Disney Dreamlight Valley, you wouldn’t initially think of puzzles involving glowing music notes. At least, that’s not what I initially imagined, but here we are. Whi… [+2119 chars]

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Facebook rolls out passkey support to fight phishing attacks - The Verge
articles.description: Facebook is adding support for passkeys, allowing you to sign into your account using your device’s authentication methods, such as a fingerprint, face scan, or PIN.
articles.content:
Using your device security instead of a password makes it harder to get tricked into giving up your Facebook account.
Facebook is adding support for passkeys on its mobile app. That means youll be a… [+2597 chars]
